note: add another question on getting a particular current, or perhaps make that its own category?

questions.text: A resistor has a resistance of 500 Ohms (Green-Black-Yellow), and the fourth band is gold. According to the manufacturer, what range is possible for the resistance of the resistor?

answerChoices.text: The resistance should be exactly 500 Ohms.

questions.text: A resistor has a resistance of 8 kOhms (Gray-Black-Red), and the fourth band is silver. According to the manufacturer, what range is possible for the resistance of the resistor?

answerChoices.text: The resistance should be exactly 8 kOhms
